name: useUserMedia
description: Custom hook that captures audio and video from the user's device. It handles permission errors, stream management, and cleanup automatically.

props.name: initialConstraints
props.description: The initial constraints for audio and video.

schema.name: audio
schema.description: Boolean or specific constraints for the audio track.

schema.name: video
schema.description: Boolean or specific constraints for the video track.

returns.name: error
returns.description: An error message string if the media capture failed, or null otherwise.

returns.name: isLoading
returns.description: A boolean indicating if the media stream is currently loading (requesting permission).

returns.name: isSupported
returns.description: A boolean indicating if the `getUserMedia` API is supported in the current environment.

returns.name: startCapture
returns.description: Function to start capturing media. Accepts optional constraints to override defaults.

returns.name: stopCapture
returns.description: Function to stop the current media capture and release tracks.

returns.name: stream
returns.description: The current MediaStream object, or null if no stream is active.

types.name: UseUserMediaConstraints
types.description: Constraints for the `useUserMedia` hook. Defines the video and audio settings for the media stream.

properties.description: Boolean or specific constraints for the audio track.
